descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Customer Value Innovation focuses on the uncertain and dynamic nature of innovation in the context of marketing communications and customer experiences. The course addresses key questions about how organizations innovate to create better value to strengthen the relevance of organizations to customers. A key area of emphasis is how organizations improve the way they introduce and nurture continuous value innovation. The course features a hands-on client project in which students develop a strategy for conducting marketing communications to enhance customer value.
